title: Introducing: Ours.
content:
Ours.

are a Portland duo comprised of Natalie Aldarondo and Rex Moreno, crafting wonderfully colourful synth-pop. With a handful of tracks on Soundcloud all uploaded within the course of the past month, it’s clearly very early days for Ours. yet there’s easily enough to suggest that they have the potential to be a force to be reckoned with. There’s elements of P4k favourites Braids, Hundred Waters and LA duo Kisses amidst their sugary sweet melodies. Check out Holy War, Sink With Me and Fall In Line below, as well as more over at their Soundcloud.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
